explains: n. 相声；串话干扰，串台

sentences.en: Dashan, who has been learning crosstalk for decades, wants to mix it up with the Western stand-up tradition.
sentences.cn: 大山已经学了几十年相声，他想把它和西方传统的单口喜剧结合起来。

sentences.en: Also see the crosstalk sketch humor.
sentences.cn: 也看到了那些幽默的相声小品。

sentences.en: This is referred to as crosstalk critical length.
sentences.cn: 这个长度就被作为串扰的关键分析点。
